name: PICOWARE: Pick a good one!
description:
Pick a good one!

This game was made for the "PICOWARE"   game jam, play the full game at https://is.gd/picoware or play the other awsome submisions at https://itch.io/jam/picoware/entries

Any minigame collection,  Wario theme or not, MUST have this classic nose picking game!

An exciting exploration up one of the nazel orifices
